item.description:
Hello Members,

Please join us on Wednesday, `August 10 from 12-2pm for our presentation on "Keep Your Data Safe and Secure:  How You Can Minimize Risks of Identity Theft."

Speaker:  Ellen Siegel is a Certified Infomation Privacy Professional.  Ellen will help us understand our legal responsibilities, so we can start to assess our current risks and make informed decisions on how to avoid or reduce them. 

Lunch will be provided and free parking is available.

This is an opportunity to build and develop business connections.

There is a meeting fee of $20 (cash or check payable to Betty Chan at the event) to cover the cost of lunch, to defray Meetup.com fees and help compensate Organizer(s) time spent planning and coordinating events.

Hope to see many of you there!

Betty
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the conference room.
item.name: Speaker and Networking Luncheon Scheduled!
